verses.verse: Now the day <S%H3117><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> that Jonathan, <S%H3083><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Saul, <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the young <S%H5288><s%> man <S%H5288><s%> who was carrying <S%H5375><s%> his armor, <S%H3627><s%> "Come <S%H1980><s%> and let us cross <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> to the Philistines' garrison <S%H4673><s%> that is on yonder <S%H5676><s%> side. <S%H5676><s%>" But he did not tell <S%H5046><s%> his father.

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> was staying <S%H3427><s%> in the outskirts <S%H7097><s%> of Gibeah <S%H1390><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the pomegranate <S%H7416><s%> tree <S%H7416><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is in Migron. <S%H4051><s%> And the people <S%H5971><s%> who <S%H834><s%> [were] with him [were] about six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> men, <S%H376><s%>

and Ahijah, <S%H281><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahitub, <S%H285><s%> Ichabod's brother, <S%H251><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Phinehas, <S%H6372><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Eli, <S%H5941><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> at Shiloh, <S%H7887><s%> was wearing <S%H5375><s%> an ephod. <S%H646><s%> And the people <S%H5971><s%> did not know <S%H3045><s%> that Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> had gone. <S%H1980><s%>

And between <S%H996><s%> the passes <S%H9278><s%> by which <S%H834><s%> Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> sought <S%H1245><s%> to cross <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> to the Philistines' garrison, <S%H4673><s%> there was a sharp <S%H8127><s%> crag <S%H5553><s%> on the one <S%H2088><s%> side, <S%H5676><s%> and a sharp <S%H8127><s%> crag <S%H5553><s%> on the other <S%H2088><s%> side, <S%H5676><s%> and the name <S%H8034><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> was Bozez, <S%H949><s%> and the name <S%H8034><s%> of the other <S%H259><s%> Seneh. <S%H5573><s%>

The one <S%H259><s%> crag <S%H8127><s%> rose <S%H4690><s%> on the north <S%H6828><s%> opposite <S%H4136><s%> Michmash, <S%H4363><s%> and the other <S%H259><s%> on the south <S%H5045><s%> opposite <S%H4136><s%> Geba. <S%H1387><s%>

Then Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the young <S%H5288><s%> man <S%H5288><s%> who was carrying <S%H5375><s%> his armor, <S%H3627><s%> "Come <S%H1980><s%> and let us cross <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> to the garrison <S%H4673><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> uncircumcised; <S%H6189><s%> perhaps <S%H194><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will work <S%H6213><s%> for us, for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is not restrained <S%H4622><s%> to save <S%H3467><s%> by many <S%H7227><s%> or <S%H176><s%> by few. <S%H4592><s%>"

And his armor <S%H3627><s%> bearer <S%H5375><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Do <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that is in your heart; <S%H3824><s%> turn <S%H5186><s%> yourself, [and] here <S%H2009><s%> I am with you according to your desire. <S%H3824><s%>"
Then Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> we will cross <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> to the men <S%H376><s%> and reveal <S%H1540><s%> ourselves to them.
"If <S%H518><s%> they say <S%H559><s%> to us, 'Wait until <S%H5704><s%> we come <S%H5060><s%> to you'; then we will stand <S%H5975><s%> in our place <S%H8478><s%> and not go <S%H5927><s%> up to them.

"But if <S%H518><s%> they say, <S%H559><s%> 'Come <S%H5927><s%> up to us,' then we will go <S%H5927><s%> up, for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> them into our hands; <S%H3027><s%> and this <S%H2088><s%> shall be the sign <S%H226><s%> to us."

And when both <S%H8147><s%> of them revealed <S%H1540><s%> themselves to the garrison <S%H4673><s%> of the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> Hebrews <S%H5680><s%> are coming <S%H3318><s%> out of the holes <S%H2356><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> they have hidden <S%H2244><s%> themselves."

So the men <S%H376><s%> of the garrison <S%H4673><s%> hailed <S%H6030><s%> Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> and his armor <S%H3627><s%> bearer <S%H5375><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Come <S%H5927><s%> up to us and we will tell <S%H3045><s%> you something. <S%H1697><s%>" And Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his armor <S%H3627><s%> bearer, <S%H5375><s%> "Come <S%H5927><s%> up after <S%H310><s%> me, for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> them into the hands <S%H3027><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>"

Then Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> climbed <S%H5927><s%> up on his hands <S%H3027><s%> and feet, <S%H7272><s%> with his armor <S%H3627><s%> bearer <S%H5375><s%> behind <S%H310><s%> him; and they fell <S%H5307><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jonathan, <S%H3083><s%> and his armor <S%H3627><s%> bearer <S%H5375><s%> put <S%H4191><s%> some to death <S%H4191><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him.

And that first <S%H7223><s%> slaughter <S%H4347><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> and his armor <S%H3627><s%> bearer <S%H5375><s%> made <S%H5221><s%> was about twenty <S%H6242><s%> men <S%H376><s%> within about half <S%H2677><s%> a furrow <S%H4618><s%> in an acre <S%H6776><s%> of land. <S%H7704><s%>

And there was a trembling <S%H2731><s%> in the camp, <S%H4264><s%> in the field, <S%H7704><s%> and among all <S%H3605><s%> the people. <S%H5971><s%> Even <S%H1571><s%> the garrison <S%H4673><s%> and the raiders <S%H7843><s%> trembled, <S%H2729><s%> and the earth <S%H776><s%> quaked <S%H7264><s%> so that it became <S%H1961><s%> a great <S%H430><s%> trembling. <S%H2731><s%>

Now Saul's watchmen <S%H6822><s%> in Gibeah <S%H1390><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> looked, <S%H7200><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> the multitude <S%H1995><s%> melted <S%H4127><s%> away; <S%H4127><s%> and they went <S%H1980><s%> here <S%H1988><s%> and [there.]

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the people <S%H5971><s%> who <S%H834><s%> [were] with him, "Number <S%H6485><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> has gone <S%H1980><s%> from us." And when they had numbered, <S%H6485><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> and his armor <S%H3627><s%> bearer <S%H5375><s%> were not [there.]

Then Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Ahijah, <S%H281><s%> "Bring <S%H5066><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> here. <S%H5066><s%>" For the ark <S%H727><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> was at that time <S%H3117><s%> with the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And it happened <S%H1961><s%> while <S%H5704><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> talked <S%H1696><s%> to the priest, <S%H3548><s%> that the commotion <S%H1995><s%> in the camp <S%H4264><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> continued <S%H1980><s%> and increased; <S%H7227><s%> so Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the priest, <S%H3548><s%> "Withdraw <S%H622><s%> your hand. <S%H3027><s%>"

Then Saul <S%H7586><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> who <S%H834><s%> [were] with him rallied <S%H2199><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to the battle; <S%H4421><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> every <S%H376><s%> man's sword <S%H2719><s%> was against his fellow, <S%H7453><s%> [and there was] very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> confusion. <S%H4103><s%>

Now the Hebrews <S%H5680><s%> [who <S%H834><s%>] were with the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> previously, <S%H865><s%> <S%H8032><s%> who <S%H834><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up with them all <S%H5439><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> in the camp, <S%H4264><s%> even <S%H1571><s%> they also <S%H1571><s%> [turned] to be with the Israelites <S%H3478><s%> who [were] with Saul <S%H7586><s%> and Jonathan. <S%H3083><s%>

When all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> who had hidden <S%H2244><s%> themselves in the hill <S%H2022><s%> country <S%H2022><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> that the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> had fled, <S%H5127><s%> even <S%H1571><s%> they also <S%H1571><s%> pursued <S%H1692><s%> them closely <S%H1692><s%> in the battle. <S%H4421><s%>
So the Lord <S%H3068><s%> delivered <S%H3467><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> that day, <S%H3117><s%> and the battle <S%H4421><s%> spread <S%H5674><s%> beyond <S%H5674><s%> Beth-aven.

Now the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were hard-pressed on that day, <S%H3117><s%> for Saul <S%H7586><s%> had put <S%H422><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> under <S%H422><s%> oath, <S%H422><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Cursed <S%H779><s%> be the man <S%H376><s%> who <S%H834><s%> eats <S%H398><s%> food <S%H3899><s%> before <S%H5704><s%> evening, <S%H6153><s%> and until <S%H5704><s%> I have avenged <S%H5358><s%> myself on my enemies. <S%H340><s%>" So none <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3605><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> tasted <S%H2938><s%> food. <S%H3899><s%>
And all <S%H3605><s%> [the people of] the land <S%H776><s%> entered <S%H935><s%> the forest, <S%H9194><s%> and there was honey <S%H1706><s%> on the ground. <S%H6440><s%> <S%H7704><s%>

When the people <S%H5971><s%> entered <S%H935><s%> the forest, <S%H9194><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> [there was] a flow <S%H1982><s%> of honey; <S%H1706><s%> but no <S%H369><s%> man put <S%H5381><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> to his mouth, <S%H6310><s%> for the people <S%H5971><s%> feared <S%H3372><s%> the oath. <S%H7621><s%>

But Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> had not heard <S%H8085><s%> when his father put <S%H1><s%> the people <S%H7650><s%> under <S%H5971><s%> oath; <S%H7650><s%> therefore, he put <S%H7650><s%> out the end <S%H7971><s%> of the staff <S%H7097><s%> that [was] in his hand <S%H4294><s%> and dipped <S%H3027><s%> it in the honeycomb, <S%H2881><s%> <S%H3295><s%> and put <S%H1706><s%> his hand <S%H7725><s%> to his mouth, <S%H3027><s%> and his eyes <S%H6310><s%> brightened. <S%H5869><s%>

Then one <S%H376><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Your father strictly <S%H1><s%> put <S%H7650><s%> the people <S%H7650><s%> under <S%H5971><s%> oath, <S%H7650><s%> saying, <S%H7650><s%> 'Cursed <S%H559><s%> be the man <S%H779><s%> who <S%H376><s%> eats <S%H834><s%> food <S%H398><s%> today. <S%H3899><s%>'" And the people <S%H3117><s%> were weary. <S%H5971><s%>

Then Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "My father has troubled <S%H1><s%> the land. <S%H5916><s%> See <S%H776><s%> now, <S%H7200><s%> how <S%H4994><s%> my eyes <S%H3588><s%> have brightened <S%H5869><s%> because <S%H215><s%> I tasted <S%H3588><s%> a little <S%H2938><s%> of this <S%H4592><s%> honey. <S%H2088><s%>

"How <S%H637><s%> much <S%H637><s%> <S%H3588><s%> more, <S%H637><s%> <S%H3588><s%> if <S%H3863><s%> only the people <S%H5971><s%> had eaten <S%H398><s%> freely <S%H398><s%> today <S%H3117><s%> of the spoil <S%H7998><s%> of their enemies <S%H340><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they found! <S%H4672><s%> For now <S%H6258><s%> the slaughter <S%H4347><s%> among the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> has not been great. <S%H7235><s%>"

And they struck <S%H5221><s%> among the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%> from Michmash <S%H4363><s%> to Aijalon. <S%H357><s%> And the people <S%H5971><s%> were very <S%H3966><s%> weary. <S%H5888><s%>

And the people <S%H5971><s%> rushed <S%H5860><s%> greedily <S%H6213><s%> upon the spoil, <S%H7998><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> sheep <S%H6629><s%> and oxen <S%H1241><s%> and calves, <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1241><s%> and slew <S%H7819><s%> [them] on the ground; <S%H776><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> ate <S%H398><s%> [them] with the blood. <S%H1818><s%>

Then they told <S%H5046><s%> Saul, <S%H7586><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> are sinning <S%H2398><s%> against the Lord <S%H3068><s%> by eating <S%H398><s%> with the blood. <S%H1818><s%>" And he said, <S%H559><s%> "You have acted <S%H898><s%> treacherously; <S%H898><s%> roll <S%H1556><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> stone <S%H68><s%> to me today. <S%H3117><s%>"

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Disperse <S%H6327><s%> yourselves <S%H6327><s%> among the people <S%H5971><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to them, 'Each <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> of you bring <S%H5066><s%> me his ox <S%H7794><s%> or his sheep, <S%H7716><s%> and slaughter <S%H7819><s%> [it] here <S%H2088><s%> and eat; <S%H398><s%> and do not sin <S%H2398><s%> against the Lord <S%H3068><s%> by eating <S%H398><s%> with the blood. <S%H1818><s%>'" So all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that night <S%H3915><s%> brought <S%H5066><s%> each <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> his ox <S%H7794><s%> with him, and slaughtered <S%H7819><s%> [it] there. <S%H8033><s%>
And Saul <S%H7586><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> to the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> it was the first <S%H2490><s%> altar <S%H4196><s%> that he built <S%H1129><s%> to the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

Then Saul <S%H7586><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Let us go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> by night <S%H3915><s%> and take <S%H962><s%> spoil <S%H962><s%> among them until <S%H5704><s%> the morning <S%H1242><s%> light, <S%H216><s%> and let us not leave <S%H7604><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> of them." And they said, <S%H559><s%> "Do <S%H6213><s%> whatever <S%H3605><s%> seems good <S%H2896><s%> to you." So the priest <S%H3548><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Let us draw <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> to God <S%H430><s%> here. <S%H1988><s%>"

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> inquired <S%H7592><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> "Shall I go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>? Wilt Thou give <S%H5414><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>?" But He did not answer <S%H6030><s%> him on that day. <S%H3117><s%>

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Draw <S%H5066><s%> near <S%H5066><s%> here, <S%H1988><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> you chiefs <S%H6438><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> and investigate <S%H3045><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> how <S%H4100><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> sin <S%H9128><s%> has happened <S%H1961><s%> today. <S%H3117><s%>

"For as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> lives, <S%H2416><s%> who delivers <S%H3467><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> though <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> it is in Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> my son, <S%H1121><s%> he shall surely <S%H3588><s%> <S%H4191><s%> die. <S%H4191><s%>" But not one <S%H369><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> him.

Then he said <S%H559><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> "You shall be on one <S%H259><s%> side <S%H5676><s%> and I and Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> my son <S%H1121><s%> will be on the other <S%H259><s%> side. <S%H5676><s%>" And the people <S%H5971><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Saul, <S%H7586><s%> "Do <S%H6213><s%> what <S%H2896><s%> seems good <S%H2896><s%> to you."

Therefore, Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> "Give <S%H3051><s%> a perfect <S%H8549><s%> [lot.]" And Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> and Saul <S%H7586><s%> were taken, <S%H3920><s%> but the people <S%H5971><s%> escaped. <S%H3318><s%>
And Saul <S%H7586><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Cast <S%H5307><s%> [lots] between <S%H996><s%> me and Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> my son. <S%H1121><s%>" And Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> was taken. <S%H3920><s%>

Then Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Jonathan, <S%H3083><s%> "Tell <S%H5046><s%> me what <S%H4100><s%> you have done. <S%H6213><s%>" So Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> told <S%H5046><s%> him and said, <S%H559><s%> "I indeed <S%H2938><s%> tasted <S%H2938><s%> a little <S%H4592><s%> honey <S%H1706><s%> with the end <S%H7097><s%> of the staff <S%H4294><s%> that was in my hand. <S%H3027><s%> Here <S%H2009><s%> I am, I must die! <S%H4191><s%>"

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "May God <S%H430><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H3541><s%> [to me] and more <S%H3254><s%> also, <S%H3541><s%> for you shall surely <S%H4191><s%> die, <S%H4191><s%> Jonathan. <S%H3083><s%>"
